name: misidentify
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to wrongly say or think that someone or something is a particular person or thing: Their clients were misidentified as terrorists. It is extremely easy to misidentify animals. Some children mis-identify the root forms of words. Related words
identify (RECOGNIZE)
misidentification
More examplesFewer examplesA story in Wednesday's paper misidentified his stepmother as his mother.The article misidentified the town where the school is located.The mine's location was misidentified in the caption.Many of these murders were never investigated or were misidentified as accidental deaths.
